name: The Rim - LD48 Jam Game
description:
Welcome to THE RIM!

Descend into the depths of a meteor impact to discover its mysteries…and yourself…

Fight the denizens of the crater, and make sure to watch out for your trusty tether! If the tether breaks, you’ll fall to your death!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement Left click - Fire

Listen to the full soundtrack by frequency.data on SoundCloud.

CHANGE LOG:
